content.value:
Because we are also travellers and we know how much you love a GOOD BREAKFAST, we focus on having the best breakfast in all Cartagena and we think we did it well!! Como to delight our delicious BUFFET BREAKFAST and enjoy as much as you want of our variety of fresh fruit, waffles, eggs, cereals, colombian coffee, natural juice, toasts… we promise you’ll love it!


The house is one of the most historic in the neighborhood with renovated installations and offers good service. We have private and shared rooms with cable TV and bathroom inside, which is an added bonus for the comfort of our guests. And yes, we know our bathrooms are small (due to the charming antiquity of the infrastructure) but we still think we prefer a bathroom inside instead of going out to find one in the middle of the night :)

Marlin Hostel is the ideal place for travelers who want to truly explore Cartagena de Indias. You will enjoy an excellent location for any kind of activity you’d like to partake in. It’s a friendly, warm and interesting ambiance where you’ll meet people from all over the world and be able to share and hear travel stories, learn languages, make friends and grab some drinks while the laughter and good vibes permeate throughout the common areas.

description.description: The hostel is located in the heart of Getsemaní, one of the most popular neighbourhoods for travellers, just a few meters from the majority of the tourist attractions, 10’ from the airport and a short walk from the beach. We have different areas to chill and hang out with other travellers, such as a hammock area, TV room, a complete kitchen for our guests or a rooftop bar where you can rest after a busy day visiting our beautiful city. We are also available to assist you and organize any kind of activity you are interested in, we have many around Cartagena and all are worth it!
